body.p:
Verona Boone Co Ky June 10th 61
Hon B Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky
Sir:

Having formed a company of Home Guards at this place I desire to know if Your Excellency can furnish it with arms. It is a cavalry company numbering about fifty effective men. The officers were not elected in accordance with the provisions of the Military Bill; but will be if it is possible to obtain arms. Our exposed condition here on the border, subject as we are to the violence of the mobs from the other side of the river, makes it necessary that the company should be armed as soon as possible.
Also, because Garrett Davis and other "Union shrieking", submission, abolition Lincolnites are receiving arms from their master and we desire to be armed.

Please answer.
Yours very resp:
V. Finnell. Capt
Verona
Ky
Sec will an swer all arms have been distributed to Which Home Guard are entitled --
